CustomField.formula:
/* TEXT(GDMFSL_Classification__c) & " - " & IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(GDMFSL_Classification__c, 'Burden'),ISPICKVAL(GDMFSL_Classification__c, 'Allowance')), TEXT(GDMFSL_Burden_Code__c) ,TEXT(Type) & IF (GDMFSL_End_of_Day_Travel__c," - End of Day Travel", IF (ISNULL(WorkOrderId),""," - ") & WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber) ) */
TEXT(GDMFSL_Classification__c) & " - " & IF( ISPICKVAL(GDMFSL_Classification__c, 'Burden'), TEXT(GDMFSL_Burden_Code__c) , "") & IF( ISPICKVAL(GDMFSL_Classification__c, 'Allowance'), TEXT(GDMFSL_Allowance__c) , "") & IF( NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(GDMFSL_Classification__c, 'Burden'),ISPICKVAL(GDMFSL_Classification__c, 'Allowance'))), TEXT(Type) & IF (GDMFSL_End_of_Day_Travel__c, " - End of Day Travel", IF (ISNULL(WorkOrderId),""," - ")) & WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber, "" )
CustomField.label: Title
